name: One of a Kind Creature
description:
This game is a sequel to Vanlen Poison Forest, so the game will make a little more sense if you play it first. 

Do not play this game if you are sensitive to flashing lights, or if you're under 18. And most certainly do not play if you're under 18 AND sensitive to flashing lights.

October 29th 2011:

Eric and Vanlen investigate the disappearances of 100 women in the city he went to college in.
